Articles.Content:
i got a idea for a planet mod

but i need to make planets

idk how to write dlls

i know java and c++

ect

but i need to also

edit orbits

like , move kerbin and stuff + add planets ,

any idea?

thx

C# is not that different from java, so it wont take llong to adjust. as for writing dlls, use Monodevelop and the wiki's tutorials: http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Setting_up_MonoDevelop

planets are a hard start for modding, try making partmodules or simple part-less plugins first

There is allready a mod that makes new planets: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/56993-Krag-s-Planet-Factory-New-Planets

I can remember reading somewhere on this forum that someone could use parts of that plugin, so maybe you could ask the maker for some insight too?

There is allready a mod that makes new planets: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/56993-Krag-s-Planet-Factory-New-Planets

I can remember reading somewhere on this forum that someone could use parts of that plugin, so maybe you could ask the maker for some insight too?

Actually this page is just *****. Better visit this - http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/65401-WIP-PlanetFactory-CE or this http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60318-Krags-PlanetFactory-Updated-Jan-22. You can create your own planets!! Thanks to Krag!
